name: Longboard Simulator 3D
description:
Longboard racing is really exciting to watch. Skaters do amazing tricks, driving on windy tracks with hairpins. Don't miss the opportunity to control a virtual longboard and compete with professional skaters.

Play with one of the longboarding masters. Who knows which amazing tricks he or she is able to perform!

Choose one of the 5 unique longboards. They are all characterized by increased resistance and improved driving performance.

Drive through the wandering serpentine, overcome obstacles and hairpins. Make your oppnents bite the dust!

Longboard Simulator 3D - Skater Rush Features:

*Join a breathtaking longboarding tournament:*
Try one of the most extreme sports racing.

*Control modern longboards:*
Bigger and faster than skateboards, they are definitely made for long distance racing

*Compete with professional skaters:*
Drive fast and do your best to overrun opponents. Become one of the top longboard skaters.

*Drive through the long serpentine:*
Slide, overcome hairpins and obstacles at top speed.
